column1: What is jenkins?;Jenkins is an open source automation server that was created to automate repetitive technical tasks involved in the continuous integration and delivery of software. It is used to automate building
column3: and deployment of applications. It helps teams take a project from idea to completion in a sustainable and repeatable way.

column1: What is jenkins?;Jenkins is an open-source automation server used to automate different types of tasks such as building
column3: and deploying software. It is used in continuous integration and continuous delivery to provide an easy way to create and manage builds. Jenkins also enables developers to quickly identify and fix build and deployment problems.

column1: Who is John Doe?;John Doe is a placeholder name used as a pseudonym in legal cases
column2: when the true identity of the person is unknown or protected. It is also commonly used to refer to a hypothetical
